title: RPC methods not working after syncing reached 100%
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.12.0`
CL client & version: prysm@v1.0.0
OS & Version: Linux


#### Expected behaviour
eth.blocknumber - should show current block height 
eth.accounts - should show all the accounts 

#### Actual behaviour

> eth.blockNumber
0
> eth.accounts
[]
> 


execution-geth-1 | INFO [06-21|09:36:01.858] Syncing: chain download in progress      synced=100.00% chain=496.26GiB headers=17,527,184@7.94GiB bodies=17,526,367@340.17GiB receipts=17,526,367@148.15GiB eta=2h19m37.733s
execution-geth-1 | INFO [06-21|09:36:06.538] Syncing: state healing in progress       accounts=292,000@15.26MiB slots=525,647@39.80MiB codes=5452@38.62MiB nodes=37,083,718@9.61GiB pending=2758

execution-geth-1 | INFO [06-21|09:36:18.589] Syncing: state healing in progress       accounts=292,000@15.26MiB slots=525,647@39.80MiB codes=5452@38.62MiB nodes=37,083,948@9.61GiB pending=3660

It looks like execution client syncing has reached 100%, but rpc methods are not working. Its been more then a day now.
it is happening while running Ethereum mainnet full node  
Can someone help here ? any sort of suggestions or guide is appreciated
